terrapeer.vui.j3dui.manipulate
Class BoxSkirt

java.lang.Object
  javax.media.j3d.SceneGraphObject
      javax.media.j3d.Node
          javax.media.j3d.Group
              terrapeer.vui.j3dui.feedback.elements.TextureShape
                  terrapeer.vui.j3dui.manipulate.BoxSkirt
public class BoxSkirt
extends TextureShape

Creates a box skirt shape (see TextureShape) intended for use as a feeler that projects from the bottom of a host object's bounding box along the -Y axis. The "top" side is away from the Y axis. The geometry of the box can be set while the object is live.

Constructor Detail

BoxSkirt

public BoxSkirt(int sideFlags,
                javax.vecmath.Tuple3d min,
                javax.vecmath.Tuple3d max,
                double length)
Constructs a BoxSkirt with the specified attributes. By default the object will not be pickable, will be white, will not be transparent, and will not be textured.

Parameters:
sideFlags - Flags indicating which sides of the object to build (Element.SIDE_???).
min - Minimum extent of the host shape bounding box.
max - Maximum extent of the host shape bounding box.
length - Length of the skirt.

BoxSkirt

public BoxSkirt(boolean pickable,
                javax.vecmath.Color3f color,
                double trans,
                java.lang.String texPath,
                int sideFlags,
                javax.vecmath.Tuple3d min,
                javax.vecmath.Tuple3d max,
                double length)
Constructs a BoxSkirt with the specified color and geometry.

Parameters:
pickable - If true the skirt is geometry pickable, otherwise it is not pickable.
color - Object intrinsic color. Null for white.
trans - Object transparency (0 - 1). If out of range transparency is disabled.
texPath - The path of the file containing the texture image. Null if none.
sideFlags - Flags indicating which sides of the object to build (Element.SIDE_???).
min - Minimum extent of the host shape bounding box.
max - Maximum extent of the host shape bounding box.
length - Length of the skirt.
Method Detail

buildGeometry

public static javax.media.j3d.Geometry buildGeometry(boolean topSide,
                                                     javax.vecmath.Tuple3d min,
                                                     javax.vecmath.Tuple3d max,
                                                     double length)
Builds the geometry for a box skirt shape.

Parameters:
topSide - If true the shape will be the "top" side. If false it will be the "bottom" side.
min - Minimum extent of the host shape bounding box.
max - Maximum extent of the host shape bounding box.
length - Length of the skirt.
Returns:
A new shape geometry. Never null.

setGeometry

public void setGeometry(javax.vecmath.Tuple3d min,
                        javax.vecmath.Tuple3d max,
                        double length)
Sets the skirt geometry, which extends below the specified bounding box along -Z.

Parameters:
min - Minimum extent of the host shape bounding box.
max - Maximum extent of the host shape bounding box.
length - Length of the skirt.

getShadingModel

public int getShadingModel()
Description copied from class: TextureShape
Gets the shading model, if any, used by this shape in generating its surface normals. If TextureShape.SHADING_NONE, the shape does not support shading. Must be overriden by subclasses.

Specified by:
getShadingModel in class TextureShape
Returns:
Shading model (TextureShape.???).
